org.eclipse.egit.github.core.service

Class MarkdownService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.egit.github.core.service.GitHubService
      • org.eclipse.egit.github.core.service.MarkdownService

  • public class MarkdownService
extends GitHubService
    Service to request Markdown text to be rendered as HTML
    See Also:
    GitHub Markdown API documentation

        public InputStream getStream(String text,
                             String mode)
                      throws IOException
        Get stream of HTML for given Markdown text

        Use getRepositoryStream(IRepositoryIdProvider, String) if you want the Markdown scoped to a specific repository.
